mapper.select: SELECT a.question_id,a.question_name,a.question_option,b.question_type_name,a.answer FROM train_question a,train_question_type b WHERE train_question = #{consumerName}

SELECT a.question_id,a.question_name,a.question_option,b.question_type_name,a.answer FROM train_question a,train_question_type b WHERE a.question_type = b.question_type_id AND a.question_name like concat('%',#{query},'%') limit #{start},#{limit}
SELECT count(1) FROM train_question WHERE question_name like concat('%',#{query},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE train_consumer SET consumer_name = #{consumerName}, consumer_phone = #{consumerPhone}, password = #{password}, consumer_company = #{consumerCompany}, consumer_type = #{consumerType} WHERE consumer_id = #{consumerId}
